storyInfo: The Doctor leaves that mysterious place, only to appear in Rhodes Island, surrounded by unexpected companions.

attributes.content: I have returned.
It feels like it has been a very long time since I left, and I have not come back to the ship for a good night's rest in quite a while either.
Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit, Siege...
Has the war outside ended? Finally, I can have a rest.
I'd like nothing more than a bowl of hot vegetable soup at the cafeteria, then plop myself down in my bed in the dorms.
What about Theresa? At this hour, she should be—
No... No, that's not right...
Theresa is gone.
The room is empty. Nobody is waiting for my return.
I clearly remember that on many nights in the past, there would be someone who would tell me a whole library's worth of stories to put me to sleep.
But now, they are no longer here.
Wait... Why is there a piece of clothing on the bed?
A white dress, with a neat corsage sewn to the collar. The needlework is deft, clearly done by a very experienced hand.
'White suits you, Amiya.'
Theresa...?
...Doctor!
attributes.name: Distant Voice

attributes.content: Can you hear my voice?
attributes.name: Approaching Voice

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are here, as I surmised.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: (I feel rather unwell.);(What happened just now?);(Where am I?)

attributes.content: Based on how you look, you seem in poor health.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am afraid that there's no way for me to do a physical examination here, Doctor. Please keep your head clear and look at me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Did you... manage to remember something?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You hear the woman's stern but caring words, and you make an effort to open your eyes wide.
Your vision gradually clears as the various parts of your body regain their functionality.
You slowly open your mouth—

attributes.options: (Unknown language) Kal'tsit...;(Unknown language) Where am I?

attributes.content: Your shattered consciousness reassembles, your fragmented thoughts realign with one another. You are now able to determine that you are standing on solid ground.
You look around, certain of the familiarity of your surroundings. You have spent quite a long time here before.
The expression on the woman before you turns rather strange. Even hostile.

attributes.options: (Unknown language) Who am I...;...;Who am I?

attributes.content: I am Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island.

attributes.options: Amiya!;Kal'tsit! Why are we on Rhodes Island?

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...It seems you still remember who you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya is not here with us. What I can say for certain that this is not the original Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: We were separated from the others?;Where are Logos and W?

attributes.content: You are the only one I have seen since I arrived here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't know what is going on?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'm as confused as you are.
Do you...;...not believe me?

attributes.content: ...A certain degree of precaution is necessary in these circumstances.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be on guard, Doctor. We must leave here, no matter what.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is not a place that we are familiar with. I do not know what unexpected complications we may encounter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Still, I will do everything I can to protect you. Don't stray too far from me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No... No more...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm so tuckered out that I could sleep for an entire month.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't be like that, Kroos!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: This is a live combat exercise! You need to treat the training room like the battlefield!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: You can be real fierce sometimes, Captain...
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Focus up. There's still lots of training drills arranged by the instructors to go.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Why so serious... They're not even here—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.options: Good morning, Kroos.;Is everyone... here?

attributes.content: Kroos!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry, the Doctor's definitely not going to tattle on us to the instructors.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Let me just take a nap here before—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I thought I gave you combat training exercises, not combat sleeping ones.
attributes.name: Stern Voice

attributes.content: ...We're doomed.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Attention, all members of A1 Detachment!
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: The Whole Team

attributes.content: All of you, a hundred laps around the training room, then fifty sets of stamina training exercises, on the double!
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Yessir...
attributes.name: The Whole Team

attributes.content: Sorry you had to see that, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: It's been too long since Rhodes Island experienced battle. These young fighters of ours can be a little slack.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: So I guess it's up to me to tighten them up.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.options: Letting them grow up peacefully isn't so bad...

attributes.content: Of course, but they still need to be prepared for any dangers we may come across.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: It'll be fine. No need to trouble yourself over their training. I'll handle it.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: You've been working real hard lately, Doctor. Go take a rest.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Don't worry. We'll be keeping watch.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.options: Did you see all that too, Kal'tsit?;Am I dreaming?

attributes.content: I saw the same scene unfurl as you did. They truly do exist here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dreams would not be so clear, and this is not a scene out of your memory.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It would be nice if everything here was real...;No, it definitely isn't real.

attributes.content: Keep a clear head, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We must press onwards.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rare to see you here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Got time to sit down and have a drink? Everything's on my tab, for one night only.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.options: It's lively here.;Sure is a lot of people, isn't it?

attributes.content: Did you forget, Doctor? Today's Outcast's retirement party.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Here's to our venerate elder.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Oh, shut it, Sharp. I'm barely older than you are.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.options: Thank you for all that you've done for Rhodes Island, Outcast.;I wish you a happy retirement.

attributes.content: Here's to you, Outcast. We'll always remember your many deeds and exquisite marksmanship.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: I can't believe that Outcast is leaving us...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There'sh not gonna to be anyone left to... *hic* drink wish me on weekend nights...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, I'm just retiring. Not even a Lateran funeral would be this sentimental.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Plus, even if I drink so much tonight that I don't wake up tomorrow, I'd call my life a life well lived.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: My memories of working alongside you all are my greatest treasures, and I'll bring them to the grave with me along with my patron firearm.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Just make sure that it's Rangers teaching the youngsters how to shoot.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: You're drunk, Outcast. He uses a gun, how's he s'pposed to teach kids 'bout—*burp*—shootin' a Sankta crossbow?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You need to cut back, Blaze. You're talking nonsense again.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Pah, both need you to keep one eye open and one eye shut. Not too big a difference.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Oh, looks like we're not the only ones at the bar tonight.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'm serious, Dagda!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Show me how powerful the fist of a Knight of the Tower can be!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Just remember, you asked for this.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Hey! This isn't the boxing gym! We're guests here on Rhodes Island, so don't go about making trouble!
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I've had my fair share of times like this before.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Now that you're formally a member of the Steam Knights, are you going to break things off with street loafers like us?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Oh, stop it... Have you made your decision, Vina?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I see no real reason for me to hesitate. My days in Norport might have been some of the happiest in my life, and I don't really see any need to return to the palace.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Alexandrina Vina Victoria is a descendant of the royal family, but she is also a normal, honorable Victorian.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: You are now an honorable Steam Knight, Allerdale, I the honorable Siege.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I believe that these lives of ours are for the best.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Peaceful lives. Such precious things.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: To life.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: To Victoria.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Whenever you're in the mood, we should go out and have a stroll together. Perhaps throw some stones at the dukes' windows?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.options: How wonderful.;...;This isn't real.

attributes.content: You still remember each and every one of them. The regret you feel over their tragic fates is clear on your face.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Otherwise you would not be seeing such things.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What do you feel, Doctor?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gratification? Confusion? Perhaps anger?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: These are the scenes that your subconscious mind wished to see.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You hoped that they were all real, didn't you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Who else will I see here?

attributes.content: Only you can answer that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let us continue, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter what you see, you must face it. Surmount it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm back, Doctor. It's been a while.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.options: ...;...Talulah?

attributes.content: Hehe, it hasn't been that long. Don't recognize me anymore?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I was out setting up an Infected treatment center in the north of Ursus. Took quite a lot of effort.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Thankfully the workers in town were all supporting us, nothing the local lord could do but compromise. We managed to get the land that we needed out of the deal.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.options: Reunion doesn't exist...?

attributes.content: Are you trying to crack a joke, Doctor, or have you just woken up?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If Reunion didn't exist, then who would be helping Rhodes Island with treating the Infected in Ursus?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.options: And Kashchey? What about him?

attributes.content: Why would you suddenly bring up the dead Black Snake?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Did you want me to thank you again? Very well. After all, it was only thanks to Rhodes Island that Ursus and I were able to cast off that mastermind and start a new future for countless people.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Cold Voice

attributes.options: No...;(Do not look back.)

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: FrostNova...
You shouldn't be here.

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You told me to give you my report immediately after completing the missions, no?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Missions... for Rhodes Island?

attributes.content: Who else would I do them for? I've always been a Rhodes Island Operator.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You look strange, Doctor. Am I standing too close and making you feel cold?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: This isn't right.;This isn't...;THIS ISN'T RIGHT!

attributes.content: One by one, the lively crew shed their visages, shifting into indistinct, jet-black shadows.
They do not appear dangerous. They just slowly drift around you.

attributes.options: Kal'tsit... What are they?

attributes.content: This is no illusion or dream. It is all real, in a sense.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All the people, all the things you have encountered in the past exist within your imagination. They took their forms based on what you most hoped to see.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: They sully our memories.;How can you stay so calm?

attributes.content: These scenes affect me as much as they do you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But they are ultimately the product of your thoughts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Originium, guided by your wishes deep in your subconscious and your desires to make up for past regrets, has reproduced what you wish to see.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You continue to hold a deep regard for everything you have experienced alongside Rhodes Island, yet despite that, you were able to break away from this beautiful lie.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only now can I believe that you, as you are now, are still the Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Originium? Since when could it do this?;Why is it being guided by what I want?

attributes.text: <color=#000000>All that you wish for, I am able to grant.</color>

attributes.options: Pries...tess...

attributes.content: As I thought, you already...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I once told you, Doctor, that others cannot tell you how to solve the mysteries surrounding you. You can only rely on yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I suspect that we are now extremely close to that critical juncture.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: If this is all based on my hopes, then are you...;I can at least say for sure that you are no illusion.

attributes.content: I thought that our prior interactions would be sufficient for you to render an accurate judgement.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope that this judgement of yours is based on rationality, and not something else.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: If these scenes are all about making up for regrets...
Will I be able to meet Theresa?

attributes.content: I do not know for certain where Theresa is, nor what she is doing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What I am sure of is that she has something to do with this environment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.options: Amiya!

attributes.content: Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit. Good, you're both here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: (Hesitate);(Step forward without hesitation)

attributes.content: Don't worry, Doctor. I am the real Amiya. Really.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *sniff* I was looking all over for you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You look a little different.;Your clothes...?

attributes.content: Theresa left me this dress.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: So she really is here?

attributes.content: I haven't seen her. I've sensed no presence of her aboard this 'Rhodes Island', in fact.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Did you run into any danger?

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: So many memories flowed before me...

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: But not only memories. Emotions too, rich ones in every shape and form.
I think that the people that we saw were truly alive.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But this form of 'life' just makes me... sad.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After walking down this corridor and seeing you, I think I understand now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The emotions that I felt all stemmed from the same source, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... 'touched' you, Doctor. I've never done that before...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The girl holds your hand, just as she has always done, but a little tighter, and more carefully this time.
I know that you've changed a lot compared to the past, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But considering all that we've experienced together, I am even more convinced that... the you who stands before me now has always been the you that I've trusted the most.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Memory may tell falsehoods, but emotion always speaks the truth.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are many things that I still don't understand at this moment. I have questions that can't be answered until we see Theresa once more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter what happens, no matter how many unhappy endings await us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll stand by my side, won't you, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I will.
I am Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Good. That's all I ask for.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's go find Theresa, then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: First, we must figure out how to leave.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The answers we seek are not here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Though this is no illusion, heaven and earth, life and death...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It is all falsehood.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hah, so even if you leave that dreary gallery of fakes, you'd just find yourself wandering around an even bigger stage?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who the hell set up these curtains for us? Their taste sucks.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, looks like the main cast is finally here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey, crone, let's put that all-knowing brain of yours to good use. I've got a real big question I want answered—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where. The hell. Are we?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A small boat, drifting atop an endless golden sea.
We are within Originium.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Within Originium, there exists a universe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
